price: Nígbà tí ìnira bá fọwọ́ bà yín lójú omi, ẹni tí ẹ̀ ń pè yó sì dòfo (mọ yín lọ́wọ́) àfi Òun nìkan (Allāhu). Nígbà ti Ó bá sì gbà yín là (tí ẹ) gúnlẹ̀ sórí ilẹ̀, ẹ̀ ń gbúnrí (kúrò lọ́dọ̀ Rẹ̀). Ènìyàn sì jẹ́ aláìmoore.
arabic: وَإِذَا مَسَّكُمُ ٱلضُّرُّ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ ضَلَّ مَن تَدۡعُونَ إِلَّآ إِيَّاهُۖ فَلَمَّا نَجَّىٰكُمۡ إِلَى ٱلۡبَرِّ أَعۡرَضۡتُمۡۚ وَكَانَ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ كَفُورًا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā massakumu al-ḍuru fī al-baḥri ḍalla man tadʿūna illā iyyāhu falammā najjākum ilā al-bari aʿraḍtum wakāna al-insānu kafūran
